company.name: Unique Solution Farms
company.tagline: From Farm to Bottle: 100% Natural Ghanaian Goodness
company.description: Ghanaian agribusiness focused on crop cultivation, fruit production, and agro-processing. Partnering with smallholder farmers to produce Unifresh 100% natural juices.
company.mission: Empower farmers, promote eco-friendly packaging, and reduce post-harvest waste while delivering healthy, natural products.
